original: @85a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @85a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya ra pa tsa na p'u dza bi dhi n'a ma /
analyzed: a'arya ra pa tsa na p'u dza bi dhi n'a ma /
translated: Ārya-rapacana-pūjā-vidhi-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa aa ra pa tsa na'i mchog pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'phags pa aa ra pa tsa na'i mchog pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
translated: The Ritual of the Worship of Ārya Rapacana

original: 'phags pa aa ra pa tsa na la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa aa ra pa tsa na la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Ārya Rapacana

original: sgrub thams su bshad pa'i rim pas de ltar bla ma'i mandal sngon du'o //
analyzed: sgrub thams su bshad pa'i rim pas de ltar bla ma'i mandal sngon du'o //
translated: In this way, in all the sādhanas, the sequence of the preliminary maṇḍala of the guru is explained.

original: shin tu mnyam par @85b gzhag la 'gro la phan pa'i sems kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: shin tu mnyam par @85b gzhag la 'gro la phan pa'i sems kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should make offerings with a mind of benefit for beings, with great equipoise.

original: aom a'a:h'um gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba'o //
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ is for protecting the place, oneself, and the yoga.

original: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a su la li ta /
analyzed: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a su la li ta /
translated: Then, Oṃ sarva tathāgata su lali

original: la li tee rna n'a m'a mi bha ga bantam aa ra pa tsa na n'a th'a /
analyzed: la li tee rna n'a m'a mi bha ga bantam aa ra pa tsa na n'a th'a /
translated: te lali te rna na ā ma i bhagavantam ara pacana nathā

original: ja: h'um bam ho: pra t'i tstsha mam ku su m'a nydza li n'a tha ho:/
analyzed: ja: h'um bam ho: pra t'i tstsha mam ku su m'a nydza li n'a tha ho:/
translated: jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ prā ticchaṃ ku su ma ājali nathā hoḥ

original: aom a'a:hr'i: pra ba ra satk'a ra ya aa ra pa tsa n'a ya p'a dyam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i: pra ba ra satk'a ra ya aa ra pa tsa n'a ya p'a dyam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ pravara satkāraya ara pacanāya pādyam prā ticcha hūṃ svāhā

original: aom a'a:hr'i:pra ba ra satk'a ra ya aa ra pa tsa n'a ya pro ksha na pra t'itstsha h'um sv'a h'a /🔽aom a'a: hr'i:pra ba ra satk'a ra ya aa ra pa tsa n'a ya aartstsha ma nam pra t'itstsha h'um sv'a h'a /🔽aom a'a: hr'i:pra ba ra satk'a ra ya aa ra ba tsa n'a ya aargham pra t'itstsha h'um sv'a h'a /🔽aom na mo manydzu gho sha ya dh'i: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /🔽aom na mo dz'a li n'i pra bh'a ya ram aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /🔽aom na ma shtsandra pra bh'a ya pam aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'um /🔽aom na ma:ke shi n+ye tsam aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /🔽aom na ma: au pa ke shi n+ye nam aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i:pra ba ra satk'a ra ya aa ra pa tsa n'a ya pro ksha na pra t'itstsha h'um sv'a h'a / aom a'a: hr'i:pra ba ra satk'a ra ya aa ra pa tsa n'a ya aartstsha ma nam pra t'itstsha h'um sv'a h'a / aom a'a: hr'i:pra ba ra satk'a ra ya aa ra ba tsa n'a ya aargham pra t'itstsha h'um sv'a h'a / aom na mo manydzu gho sha ya dh'i: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a / aom na mo dz'a li n'i pra bh'a ya ram aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a / aom na ma shtsandra pra bh'a ya pam aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'um / aom na ma:ke shi n+ye tsam aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a / aom na ma: au pa ke shi n+ye nam aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ pravara satkāraya arapacana praṣṇapratiṣṭa hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ pravara satkāraya arapacana arcanā pratiṣṭa hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ pravara satkāraya arapacana arghaṃ pratiṣṭa hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ namo mañjughoṣāya dhiḥ. Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ namo jālini prabhāya raṃ. Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ namo śaṃcara prabhāya paṃ. Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ namo keśinyai caṃ. Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ namo upakeśinyai naṃ. Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.🔽

original: aom na ma: aa ksho bhy'a ya h'um /🔽aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom na ma: aa ksho bhy'a ya h'um /🔽aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ namo ’kṣobhyāya hūṃ.🔽Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.🔽

original: aom na mo be ro tsa n'a ya aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom na mo be ro tsa n'a ya aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ namo bhagavate oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom na mo ratna sam bha b'a ya tr'am /
analyzed: aom na mo ratna sam bha b'a ya tr'am /
translated: Oṃ namo ratna sambhave traṃ.

original: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya hr'i: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya hr'i: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ namo amitābhāya hrīḥ. Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom na ma lo tsa n'a ye l'am aom ao /
analyzed: aom na ma lo tsa n'a ye l'am aom ao /
translated: Oṃ namo locanāyai laṃ oṃ.

original: badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom na mo l'a me kye m'am aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom na mo l'a me kye m'am aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ namo māmakye kṣeṃ. Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom na ma: panda r'a yee p'am aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a //
analyzed: aom na ma: panda r'a yee p'am aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a //
translated: Oṃ namo pañcarāgāya pāṃ. Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.

original: aa aom na ma st'a r'a yee t'am aom badzra peshpe h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aa aom na ma st'a r'a yee t'am aom badzra peshpe h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ namo tārāyai tāṃ. Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: aom a'a:h'um / 'da yi rim pas /🔽aom badzra dh'u pe h'um sv'a h'a/ aom badzra d'i pe h'um sv'a h'a /🔽aom badzra gandhe h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um / 'da yi rim pas / aom badzra dh'u pe h'um sv'a h'a/ aom badzra d'i pe h'um sv'a h'a / aom badzra gandhe h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: In this order:🔽Oṃ vajra dhūpe hūṃ svāhā. Oṃ vajra dīpe hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ vajra gandhe hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom badzra nee bi dye h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra nee bi dye h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra naividye hūṃ svāhā.

original: de rnams kyi mdun du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po rnams nye par yang dag par dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mdun du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po rnams nye par yang dag par dbul bar bya'o //
translated: In front of them, one should offer the five sense objects.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza ma gha pra sa ra sa mu dra sphar na hi mam ga gan kham h'um phat /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza ma gha pra sa ra sa mu dra sphar na hi mam ga gan kham h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata pūja maṇḍala prasara samudra spharaṇa himaṃ gagana khaṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: mchod pa byin gyis brlabs par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa byin gyis brlabs par bya'o //
translated: One should consecrate the offerings.

original: dngos po med kyang yid las byung ba'i mchod pa dbul lo //
analyzed: dngos po med kyang yid las byung ba'i mchod pa dbul lo //
translated: Even though they are not real, one should offer mentally created offerings.

original: na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am sarba th'a kham aungga te sphar na hi mam ga ga na kham sa manta sv'a h'a /
analyzed: na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am sarba th'a kham aungga te sphar na hi mam ga ga na kham sa manta sv'a h'a /
translated: Namaḥ sarva buddhābodhisatvanāṃ sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittaprajñājñānasarvakarmapāpaṃ sarvaśukhamasmiṃ sthāpayāmi sarvasatvāṃ sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittaprajñājñānasamaye vajrasatvaḥ svāhā.

original: yid kyis mchod pa byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyis mchod pa byin gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: This is the consecration of mental offerings.

original: ri bong 'dzin pa lta bu yi //
analyzed: ri bong 'dzin pa lta bu yi //
translated: Like the moon,

original: ces pa la sogs pa dang / rin chen gsum rnams phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa dang / rin chen gsum rnams phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: and so forth, and: I pay homage to the three jewels.

original: mchod pa'ang rin chen gsum po la //
analyzed: mchod pa'ang rin chen gsum po la //
translated: Also, offerings are made to the three jewels.

original: sdig pa gang rnams brjod par brjod par bgyi /
analyzed: sdig pa gang rnams brjod par brjod par bgyi /
translated: Whatever sins are to be confessed,

original: bsod nams kun la rjes su dga' //
analyzed: bsod nams kun la rjes su dga' //
translated: I rejoice in all merits.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor zhing //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor zhing //
translated: Turning the wheel of Dharma,

original: myang ngan 'da' rtag tu bzhugs //
analyzed: myang ngan 'da' rtag tu bzhugs //
translated: And remain forever in nirvana.

original: bdag gis sbyin sogs bsod @86a * //
analyzed: bdag gis sbyin sogs bsod @86a * //
translated: Through my merit of generosity and so forth,

original: nams kyis // bdag la kun rtog yongs su bsgyur //
analyzed: nams kyis // bdag la kun rtog yongs su bsgyur //
translated: May I transform all my conceptualizations.

original: zhes pa rnam pa bdun bla na med pa'i mchod pa byas nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes pa rnam pa bdun bla na med pa'i mchod pa byas nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir /
translated: Having made the sevenfold unsurpassable offering in this way, in order to confer the empowerment,

original: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mos mngon par dga' bas dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mos mngon par dga' bas dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: the goddesses such as Lochana confer the empowerment with great delight.

original: rang gi rigs kyi ngo bor byas nas 'dod pa'i phyir bdag la dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: rang gi rigs kyi ngo bor byas nas 'dod pa'i phyir bdag la dbang bskur ro //
translated: Having made them the essence of one's family, one should confer the empowerment upon oneself in order to enjoy.

original: gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha rnams kyis //
analyzed: gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha rnams kyis //
translated: The gods of the pure abodes

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs 'khrungs tshe //
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs 'khrungs tshe //
translated: Just as when the Tathagata was born

original: kun bkrus de bzhin bdag dbang bskur //🔽aom a'a: sarba ta th'a ga r'a bhi she ka sam ya shri ye h'um /
analyzed: kun bkrus de bzhin bdag dbang bskur // aom a'a: sarba ta th'a ga r'a bhi she ka sam ya shri ye h'um /
translated: All were bathed, so I confer empowerment.🔽Om Ah Sarva Tathagata Abhisheka Samaya Shriye Hum

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma kony\ham /🔽yi ge'i rang bzhin 'byung gnas dang // lhan cig kun du rnam par rtog //
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma kony\ham / yi ge'i rang bzhin 'byung gnas dang // lhan cig kun du rnam par rtog //
translated: Om Sarva Tathagata Abhisheka Vajra Svabhava Atmako Ham🔽The source of the nature of the syllables

original: grangs med a'a li k'a li'i tshogs //
analyzed: grangs med a'a li k'a li'i tshogs //
translated: Is imagined together with the assembly of the countless Alikali.

original: de nyid rtogs pa'i rnam par 'gro / aom pa de pa de ma h'a dzny'a na sarba buddha ma yam bha me h'um h'um h'um ho: ho: ho: aa kham sv'a h'a /
analyzed: de nyid rtogs pa'i rnam par 'gro / aom pa de pa de ma h'a dzny'a na sarba buddha ma yam bha me h'um h'um h'um ho: ho: ho: aa kham sv'a h'a /
translated: Om padapadma mahā-jñāna sarva buddha-māyām bhame hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hoḥ hoḥ hoḥ a-khaṃ svāhā.

original: 'di yis gsang sngags kyi phreng ba rnams byin gyis brlabs la gsang sngags bzlas so//
analyzed: 'di yis gsang sngags kyi phreng ba rnams byin gyis brlabs la gsang sngags bzlas so//
translated: Having consecrated the rosary of mantras with this [mantra], one should recite the mantra.

original: gsang sngags bla ma'i nye bar bshad pa las rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags bla ma'i nye bar bshad pa las rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand [the consecration of the rosary] from the explanation of the guru's mantra.

original: bzlas pa byas nas gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya ste /🔽yam yig gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: bzlas pa byas nas gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya ste / yam yig gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Having performed the recitation, one should consecrate the bali.🔽With the syllable yaṃ, [there is] the wind maṇḍala.

original: ri yig gis me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: ri yig gis me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: With the syllable ri, [there is] the fire maṇḍala.

original: de'i steng du kam yig gis sgyed pu gsum gyi steng du /
analyzed: de'i steng du kam yig gis sgyed pu gsum gyi steng du /
translated: Upon that, with the syllable kaṃ, upon three stove supports,

original: aa yig las skyes pa'i snod du 'chi med lnga dang rab tu gsal ba lnga po lhan cig bzhu nas /
analyzed: aa yig las skyes pa'i snod du 'chi med lnga dang rab tu gsal ba lnga po lhan cig bzhu nas /
translated: in a vessel arisen from the syllable a, the five ambrosias and the five clarifications melt together.

original: 'chi med ye shes bcu gnas dbul bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'chi med ye shes bcu gnas dbul bar bya ste /
translated: The nectar of the ten wisdoms is offered.

original: aom aa ra pa tsa n'a ya aadga pu st'a ka ha st'a ya ai mam ba lim kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
analyzed: aom aa ra pa tsa n'a ya aadga pu st'a ka ha st'a ya ai mam ba lim kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
translated: Om arpaṇāyā adhiṣṭhānāya hasthāya imaṃ baliṃ kha kha khāhi khāhi.

original: ha na ha na /
analyzed: ha na ha na /
translated: hana hana

original: da ha da ha /
analyzed: da ha da ha /
translated: dada dada

original: pa tsa ba tsa /
analyzed: pa tsa ba tsa /
translated: pacaya pacaya

original: ma ma sarba satv'a n'a nytsa pra tya' rtha ka na bandha bandha n'i dh'i: shri kham /
analyzed: ma ma sarba satv'a n'a nytsa pra tya' rtha ka na bandha bandha n'i dh'i: shri kham /
translated: mama sarva sattva nayanam pratyarthakam bandha bandha ni🔽dhiḥ śrikham

original: aa ra ba tsa n'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aa ra ba tsa n'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: āraya svāhā

original: gtor ma'i sngags so //
analyzed: gtor ma'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra of the bali offering.

original: chad pa dang lhag pa dgang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: chad pa dang lhag pa dgang ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to fill in any omissions or additions,

original: yi ge brgya ba brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: yi ge brgya ba brjod par bya ste /
translated: one should recite the one-hundred-syllable mantra:

original: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
analyzed: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
translated: oṃ vajrasattva samaya

original: ma nu p'a la ya /🔽badzra satva tve no pa /🔽tishtha dri dho me bha ba /🔽su to shyo me bha ba /🔽su po shyo me bha ba /🔽aa nu raktome bha ba /
analyzed: ma nu p'a la ya / badzra satva tve no pa / tishtha dri dho me bha ba / su to shyo me bha ba / su po shyo me bha ba / aa nu raktome bha ba /
translated: maṇḍala

original: sarba siddhimme pra yatstsha /🔽sarba karmma su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
analyzed: sarba siddhimme pra yatstsha / sarba karmma su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
translated: vajrasattva tvenopatiṣṭha dṛḍho me bhava sutoṣyo me bhava anurakto me bhava supoṣyo me bhava sarvasiddhiṃ me prayaccha sarvakarma suca me cittaṃ śreyaḥ kuru hūṃ🔽ha ha ha ha hoḥ bhagavān sarvatathāgatavajra mā me muñca vajrī bhava mahāsamayasattva āḥ

original: ha ha ha ha ho: bhag b'an sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sam ya srva a'a: bdag cag sems cad don kun mdzad //
analyzed: ha ha ha ha ho: bhag b'an sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sam ya srva a'a: bdag cag sems cad don kun mdzad //
translated: You who accomplish all the purposes of sentient beings,

original: ji ltar rjes rtogs dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: ji ltar rjes rtogs dngos grub stsol //
translated: Grant spiritual powers according to our realization.

original: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs pa dang// @86b slar ni byon par mdzad gyur cig / aom mu: sv'a h'as gshegs par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs pa dang// @86b slar ni byon par mdzad gyur cig / aom mu: sv'a h'as gshegs par bya'o //
translated: With Om, muḥ, svāhā, they should be dismissed.

original: smon lam gyi bye brag kyang gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: smon lam gyi bye brag kyang gdab par bya'o //
translated: One should also make various kinds of prayers.

original: dus gsum bsags dang yod pa'i dge ba yis //
analyzed: dus gsum bsags dang yod pa'i dge ba yis //
translated: By the virtue accumulated in the three times,

original: bdag cag srid kun pha rol phyin nas ni //
analyzed: bdag cag srid kun pha rol phyin nas ni //
translated: may we cross over all of existence,

original: sems cad kun bcas rin chen rtogs ldan pa'i //
analyzed: sems cad kun bcas rin chen rtogs ldan pa'i //
translated: and, together with all sentient beings,

original: bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur //
translated: attain the unsurpassed fruit, endowed with jewels.

original: 'phags pa aar pa tsa na'i mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa aar pa tsa na'i mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so //
translated: The ritual of the worship of Ārya Avalokiteśvara is completed.

original: lung du ston pa'i bstan bcos kyi skad cung zad rtogs pa'i /
analyzed: lung du ston pa'i bstan bcos kyi skad cung zad rtogs pa'i /
translated: A little understanding of the language of the explanatory treatises,

original: sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzad pos /
analyzed: sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzad pos /
translated: the Śākya bhikṣu Nyima Gyaltsen Palzangpo,

original: grub pa'i zhing dam pa mang yul skyid grong 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang po'i gtsug lag khang las /
analyzed: grub pa'i zhing dam pa mang yul skyid grong 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang po'i gtsug lag khang las /
translated: in the temple of Ārya Lokeśvara in the prosperous land of Mangyül,

original: cung zad mi ring ba'i chen po rnams kyi gdan sa /
analyzed: cung zad mi ring ba'i chen po rnams kyi gdan sa /
translated: not far from the seat of the great ones,

original: dpal sher gyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: dpal sher gyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated in the temple of Pal Sher.
